name: zkipp
description: ## Overview We propose a Zero-Knowledge Inclusion Proof Protocol (ZKIPP), enabling validators to prove the presence of domain-tagged IoT transactions in anchored snapshots  without disclosing Merkle path, sibling nodes, or domain metadata. This is achieved through a Poseidon-based zkSNARK circuit, which supports fast, lightweight  privacy-preserving validation as a standalone module

scripts.setup:trusted: snarkjs groth16 setup setup/inclusion.r1cs setup/powersOfTau28_hez_final_16.ptau setup/inclusion.zkey
scripts.export:verifier: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey setup/inclusion.zkey setup/verifier.json
scripts.proof-verification-runtime: npx snarkjs groth16 verify setup/verifier.json setup/public.json setup/proof.json
scripts.export-verification-key: npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey setup/inclusion.zkey setup/verifier.json
